de.mrapp.android.util.view

Interface HeaderAndFooterAdapterView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExpandableGridView, HeaderAndFooterGridView, HeaderAndFooterRecyclerView

    public interface HeaderAndFooterAdapterView
    Defines the interface an adapter view, e.g. a grid view or recycler view, which allows to display fixed views as headers and footers, must implement
    Since:
    1.20.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFooterView(android.view.View view)
      Adds a fixed view to appear at the bottom of the adapter view.
      void addHeaderView(android.view.View view)
      Adds a fixed view to appear at the top of the adapter view.
      android.view.View getFooterView(int index)
      Returns the footer view at a specific index.
      int getFooterViewsCount()
      Returns the number of footer views in the adapter view.
      android.view.View getHeaderView(int index)
      Returns the header view at a specific index.
      int getHeaderViewsCount()
      Returns the number of header views in the adapter view.
      void removeAllFooterViews()
      Removes all footer views.
      void removeAllHeaderViews()
      Removes all header views.
      android.view.View removeFooterView(int index)
      Removes the footer view at a specific index.
      void removeFooterView(android.view.View view)
      Removes a previously added footer view.
      android.view.View removeHeaderView(int index)
      Removes and returns the header view at a specific index.
      void removeHeaderView(android.view.View view)
      Removes a previously added header view.

    • Method Detail

      • addHeaderView

        void addHeaderView(@NonNull
                   android.view.View view)
        Adds a fixed view to appear at the top of the adapter view. If this method is called more than once, the views will appear in the order they were added.
        Parameters:
        view - The header view, which should be added, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeHeaderView

        void removeHeaderView(@NonNull
                      android.view.View view)
        Removes a previously added header view.
        Parameters:
        view - The header view, which should be removed, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeHeaderView

        @NonNull
android.view.View removeHeaderView(int index)
        Removes and returns the header view at a specific index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the header view, which should be removed, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and less than getHeaderViewsCount()
        Returns:
        The header view, which has been removed, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeAllHeaderViews

        void removeAllHeaderViews()
        Removes all header views.

      • getHeaderView

        @NonNull
android.view.View getHeaderView(int index)
        Returns the header view at a specific index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the header view to be returned, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and less than getHeaderViewsCount()
        Returns:
        The header view at the given index as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • getHeaderViewsCount

        int getHeaderViewsCount()
        Returns the number of header views in the adapter view.
        Returns:
        The number of header views as an Integer value

      • addFooterView

        void addFooterView(@NonNull
                   android.view.View view)
        Adds a fixed view to appear at the bottom of the adapter view. If this method is called more than once, the views will appear in the order they were added.
        Parameters:
        view - The footer view, which should be added, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeFooterView

        void removeFooterView(@NonNull
                      android.view.View view)
        Removes a previously added footer view.
        Parameters:
        view - The footer view, which should be removed, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeFooterView

        @NonNull
android.view.View removeFooterView(int index)
        Removes the footer view at a specific index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the footer view, which should be removed, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and less than getFooterViewsCount()
        Returns:
        The footer view, which has been removed, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • removeAllFooterViews

        void removeAllFooterViews()
        Removes all footer views.

      • getFooterView

        @NonNull
android.view.View getFooterView(int index)
        Returns the footer view at a specific index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the footer view to be returned as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and less than getFooterViewsCount()
        Returns:
        The footer view at the given index as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • getFooterViewsCount

        int getFooterViewsCount()
        Returns the number of footer views in the adapter view.
        Returns:
        The number of footer views as an Integer value
